mapper.select: SELECT A.NOTICE_SEQ AS noticeSeq, A.CATE_CD AS cateCD, A.SITE_CLS_CD AS siteClsCD, A.NOTICE_NO AS noticeNO, A.NOTICE_TITLE AS noticeTitle, A.NOTICE_TEXT_CONTENT AS noticeTextContent, A.NOTICE_HTML_CONTENT AS noticeHTMLContent, A.REPLY_YN AS replyYN, A.SORT_ORD AS sortOrd, A.READ_CNT AS readCnt, A.USE_YN AS useYN, A.POST_STR_DTTM AS postStrDttm, A.POST_END_DTTM AS postEndDttm, A.ATCH_FILE_ID AS atchFileID, A.POPUP_YN AS popupYN, A.POPUP_STR_DTTM AS popupStrDttm, A.POPUP_END_DTTM AS popupEndDttm, A.MAIN_NOTICE_YN AS mainNoticeYN, A.MAIN_NOTICE_STR_DTTM AS mainNoticeStrDttm, A.MAIN_NOTICE_END_DTTM AS mainNoticeEndDttm, A.REG_DTTM AS regDttm, A.REG_ID AS regID, A.MOD_DTTM AS modDttm, A.MOD_ID AS modID , CASE WHEN SORT_ORD > 10000 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS topYn -- 20200607 최상단 여부 체크 , B.ADMIN_GRP_SEQ AS adminGrpSeq FROM TB_COM_NOTICE A LEFT JOIN TB_SYS_ADMIN B ON ( A.REG_ID = B.ADMIN_ID ) WHERE NOTICE_SEQ = #{noticeSeq}

SELECT IMG_PATH AS imgPath, IMG_URL AS imgURL, IMG_NAME AS imgName, REPLACE(IMG_NAME,(RIGHT(SUBSTR(IMG_NAME,1,(INSTR(IMG_NAME,REPLACE(SUBSTR(RIGHT(IMG_NAME,5),2,(INSTR(IMG_NAME,'.')+4)),'.',''))-2)),15)),'') AS imgNm, IMG_SIZE AS imgSize, IMG_SEQ AS imgSeq, THUMBNAIL_IMG_PATH AS thumbnailImgPath, THUMBNAIL_IMG_URL AS thumbnailImgURL, THUMBNAIL_IMG_NAME AS thumbnailImgName, THUMBNAIL_IMG_SIZE AS thumbnailImgSize FROM TB_COM_EDITOR_IMG WHERE BBS_SEQ = #{noticeSeq} AND BBS_CLS_CD = #{currentMenu} ORDER BY IMG_SEQ ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_COM_NOTICE ( CATE_CD, SITE_CLS_CD, NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_TEXT_CONTENT, NOTICE_HTML_CONTENT, REPLY_YN, SORT_ORD, USE_YN, POST_STR_DTTM, POST_END_DTTM, POPUP_YN, POPUP_STR_DTTM, POPUP_END_DTTM, MAIN_NOTICE_YN, MAIN_NOTICE_STR_DTTM, MAIN_NOTICE_END_DTTM, REG_DTTM, REG_ID, MOD_DTTM, MOD_ID, STATION_ID ) SELECT #{cateCD}, #{siteClsCD}, MAX(NOTICE_SEQ) + 1, #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeTextContent}, #{noticeHTMLContent}, #{replyYN} , CASE WHEN #{topYN} = 'Y' THEN MAX(SORT_ORD) + 1 ELSE MAX(NOTICE_SEQ) + 1 END , #{mainNoticeYN}, #{postStrDttm}, #{postEndDttm}, #{popupYN}, #{postStrDttm}, #{postEndDttm}, #{mainNoticeYN}, #{postStrDttm}, #{postEndDttm}, NOW(), #{regID}, NOW(), #{regID}, IFNULL( #{noticeStationId}, '') FROM TB_COM_NOTICE
mapper.update:
UPDATE TB_COM_NOTICE A INNER JOIN ( SELECT MAX(SORT_ORD) + 1 AS SORT_ORD_MAX FROM TB_COM_NOTICE ) B ON ( 1=1 ) SET CATE_CD = #{cateCD},
SITE_CLS_CD = #{siteClsCD},
SITE_CLS_CD = NULL,
NOTICE_NO = #{noticeNO}, NOTICE_TITLE = #{noticeTitle}, NOTICE_TEXT_CONTENT = #{noticeTextContent}, NOTICE_HTML_CONTENT = #{noticeHTMLContent}, SORT_ORD = CASE WHEN #{topYN} = 'Y' THEN B.SORT_ORD_MAX ELSE #{noticeNO} END , POST_STR_DTTM = #{postStrDttm}, POST_END_DTTM = #{postEndDttm}, POPUP_YN = #{popupYN}, POPUP_STR_DTTM = #{postStrDttm}, POPUP_END_DTTM = #{postEndDttm}, MAIN_NOTICE_YN = #{mainNoticeYN}, USE_YN = #{mainNoticeYN}, MAIN_NOTICE_STR_DTTM = #{postStrDttm}, MAIN_NOTICE_END_DTTM = #{postEndDttm}, MOD_DTTM = NOW(), MOD_ID = #{modID} WHERE NOTICE_SEQ = #{noticeSeq}
mapper.select: SELECT T1. NOTICE_SEQ AS noticeSeq, CATE_CD AS cateCD, SITE_CLS_CD AS siteClsCD, NOTICE_NO AS noticeNO, NOTICE_TITLE AS noticeTitle, NOTICE_TEXT_CONTENT AS noticeTextContent, NOTICE_HTML_CONTENT AS noticeHTMLContent FROM ( SELECT TT1. NOTICE_SEQ, CATE_CD, SITE_CLS_CD, NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_TEXT_CONTENT, NOTICE_HTML_CONTENT FROM TB_COM_NOTICE TT1 WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND POPUP_YN = #{popupYN} AND DATE_FORMAT(TT1.POST_STR_DTTM,'%Y%m%d') <= #{searchStartDate} AND DATE_FORMAT(TT1.POST_END_DTTM,'%Y%m%d') >= #{searchEndDate} AND ( TT1.SITE_CLS_CD LIKE CONCAT('%',#{siteClsCD},'%')) ) T1 WHERE NOTICE_SEQ =#{noticeSeq}

SELECT SUBSTR(IMG_URL,21,1000) AS attachNm , IMG_URL AS imgUrl, REPLACE(IMG_NAME,(RIGHT(SUBSTR(IMG_NAME,1,(INSTR(IMG_NAME,REPLACE(SUBSTR(RIGHT(IMG_NAME,5),2,(INSTR(IMG_NAME,'.')+4)),'.',''))-2)),15)),'') AS imgName FROM TB_COM_EDITOR_IMG WHERE IMG_SEQ = #{imgSeq} AND IMG_URL LIKE '%NOTICE%'
